settings.passwordPolicy.minimumLength.me: Value of 'minimum length' must be greater than or equal to 1.
settings.passwordPolicy.maximumLength.me: Value of 'maximum length' must be greater or equal to that of 'minimum length'.
Value of 'maximum length' must be less than or equal to 20.
settings.passwordPolicy.minimumUpperCase: Value of 'minimum uppercase' must be less than maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.minimumNumbers.m: Value of 'minimum number' must be less than maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.minimumSpecialCh: Value of 'minimum special character' must be less than maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.passwordsRemembe: Password remember times must be equal to or greater than 1.
Password remember times must be equal to or less than 5.
Number of fail attempt times must be equal to or greater than 1.
Number of fail attempt times must be equal to or less than 5.
settings.passwordPolicy.passwordExpiryDa: Password expiry day(s) must be equal to or greater than 1.
Password expiry day(s) must be equal to or less than 365.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.validate: Value of 'minimum Length' should be greater than or equal to 1.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.isGreate: Should be less than or equal to the maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.validate: Value of 'maximum Length' should be less than or equal to 20.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.isUpperc: Upper case should be less than or equal to the maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.isMinNum: Value of 'Numbers' should be less than or equal to the maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.isMinSpe: Special characters should be less than or equal to the maximum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.isSumOfM: The sum of minimum upper case, minimum numbers and minimum special characters should not be greater than the value of maximum length.
The value of 'minimum length' should be greater or equal to the sum of value of minimum upper case, minimum numbers and minimum special characters.
settings.passwordPolicy.message.validate: The sum of minimum lowercase,uppercase, minimum numbers and minimum special characters should be less than or equal to the minimum length.
settings.passwordPolicy.label.dontAllowP: Should not be similar to the User ID and Username
